#SeqExter - DNA string search and alignment

= SeqExter Usage

with lactuca_big_gene_CDS.frgm.query file:

bash-2.03$ tclsh8.4 seqexter_2010_03_08.tcl lactuca_IGA_reads_mRNASeq_test.seqs lactuca_IGA_reads_mRNASeq_test.seqs.out FILE lactuca_big_gene_CDS.frgm.query 10000   100    PROC_01   LOOP_SINGLE

or (with lactuca_SNPs_907_CDS.test.query test file):

tclsh8.4 seqexter_2010_03_08.tcl lactuca_IGA_reads_mRNASeq_test.seqs lactuca_IGA_reads_mRNASeq_test.seqs.snp FILE lactuca_SNPs_907_CDS.test.query 10000   100    PROC_01   LOOP_SINGLE
